title: Podcast 382: 3 Tips to make your home a mental health haven
description:
Sign up to Patreon to get access to bonus ad-free podcasts, exclusive downloads, live Q&As and more: https://www.patreon.com/drcarolineleaf


EPISODE DESCRIPTION:In this podcast I talk about how to make your home a mental health haven. When the world feels like a mess (a common sentiment these days!), it is important that your home is a haven—a place where you can rest, relax, and feel happy. Thankfully, there are many ways we can create a joyful atmosphere at home. Listen now to learn how! 

Read the show blog here: https://drleaf.com/blogs/news/3-tips-to-make-your-home-a-mental-health-haven

EPISODE HIGHLIGHTS:

1:02 Why it is important to make your home a haven

1:40 Finding a healthy work-life balance, especially at home!

2:40, 5:22 The power of bringing nature into your home

6:10 Why natural light is so important

7:15 How a clean environment can positively impact our mental health

8:18, 12:10, 16:40 Why we need to make time to bond with our loved ones at home

17:20 Practicing self-regulation & mind management at home
